info.title: CheapShark API
info.description:
**API Description** - CheapShark API is an application programming interface that provides access to data related to video game prices, deals, and stores from CheapShark, a price comparison website.

**Disclaimer** - This *OpenAPI* specification was generated with the tool *RESTSpecIT*. Even though the tool verifies as much as possible the model responses, mistakes and/or inaccuracies may be found in the generated specification. Thus, data such as the license or the e-mail of the API should still be manually verified. Moreover, invalid API parameters are often ignored in *nearly* valid requests, as RESTful APIs tend to apply the **robustness principle**. This principle states that *programs receiving messages should accept non-conformant input as long as the meaning is clear*. As the validity of such parameters is difficult to verify, some described parameters may result in false positives. Query parameters that were found but did not specify a value have their schema type set to **x-null**.

contact.name: CheapShark API Contact
contact.email: The e-mail address used to contact the 'CheapShark API' is contact@cheapshark.com

servers.description: Production Server of the CheapShark API.

externalDocs.description: Find more about the CheapShark API here:

text/html; charset=utf-8.example:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
<title>Not Found | CheapShark</title>
<meta name="description" content="404 Page Not Found!" />
<meta name="robots" content="noindex">

<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8">
<meta name="keywords" content="game,deals,steam,digital,downloads,pc,sales,compare,prices,search,gamersgate,greenmangaming,gog">
<meta property="og:title" ...
